import React from 'react' import { Carousel, Col, Image, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' function ProductDetail() { const { productReducers : { product }, } = useSelector((state) => state) const renderImages = () => { return product.images && product.images.map((image) => ( )) } return ( product && <> {product.images && product.images.length === 1 ? : {renderImages()} } {product.name} Бренд: {product.brandName.toUpperCase()}
Продавець: {product.seller}
Статус: {product.useStatus} { product.videoURL && } {product.description} Location
{product.district} / {product.province} Стартова ставка: ${product.price} ) } export default ProductDetail
